channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jobs report on eve of election will be among the most distorted in years
item.description: Four days before Election Day, the government will issue its final snapshot of hiring and unemployment in the United States after a presidential race in which voter perceptions of the economy have played a central role.

item.title: Maryland voters embrace rare chance to help determine US Senate control
item.description: Republican and Democratic voters in Maryland largely agree on one thing: the state’s U.S. Senate race between Republican Larry Hogan and Democrat Angela Alsobrooks has unusually high stakes this year.

item.title: Inside ‘the weave': How Donald Trump’s rhetoric has grown darker and windier
item.description: Over the closing weeks of his third presidential campaign, Donald Trump’s presentation has grown as disjointed as ever and notably darker.
